item.title: EP 358 - The 2019 Christmas Spectacular!
item.itunes:title: The 2019 Christmas Spectacular!
item.description:
Today is Christmas and we look at three heartwarming stories involving bank robberies and pickled children!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Minecraft Server

deadrabbitradio171191.apexmc.co

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Colorado Springs man reportedly robs bank, throws money into the air and yells, “Merry Christmas”

https://www.denverpost.com/2019/12/24/bank-robbery-colorado-springs-christmas/

 

‘Star Wars’ fan Riley Howell, who died a hero at UNCC, is enshrined as a Jedi now

https://www.charlotteobserver.com/news/local/article238664223.html

 

University of North Carolina at Charlotte shooting

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_North_Carolina_at_Charlotte_shooting

 

Saint Nicholas

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saint_Nicholas

 

St. Nicholas, Enemy of Demons

https://blogs.ancientfaith.com/asd/2015/12/09/st-nicholas-enemy-of-demons/

 

Manna of St. Nicholas of Bari

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/manna-of-st-nicholas-of-bari

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
